mapper.sql: id, shop_id, merchant_id, title, content, images, video_url, product_id, view_count, like_count, comment_count, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM dynamic WHERE merchant_id = #{merchantId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dynamic ( shop_id, merchant_id, title, content, images, video_url, product_id, view_count, like_count, comment_count, status, create_time ) VALUES ( #{shopId}, #{merchantId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{images}, #{videoUrl}, #{productId}, 0, 0, 0, #{status}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE dynamic SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE dynamic SET like_count = like_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
